en.today: Tension brews within your community early this morning, dear Aries, as the Aquarius moon and Mars square off. You'll find safety amongst those who operate on a similar wavelength as the hours pass, and you should work toward building up communities instead of navigating complex dynamics. A nervous energy emerges this evening while Luna and Venus form an unbalanced aspect, marking the perfect excuse to prioritize wellness from the privacy of home.
